ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Rapidly construct standard dialog boxes for your GUI, including  message boxes, input boxes, list, file or directory selection, ... In case R cannot display GUI dialog boxes, a simpler command line version of these interactive elements is also provided as fallback solution.

Rapidly construct standard dialog boxes for your GUI, including  message boxes, input boxes, list, file or directory selection, ... In case R cannot display GUI dialog boxes, a simpler command line version of these interactive elements is also provided as fallback solution.

name: r-svdialogs
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.1.2" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-svdialogs
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: svDialogs_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/svDialogs_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/svDialogs/svDialogs_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 817e76dbfe3c7c96cf6eb17e4f3a07046d724e0e3d5091b7b87c4ac7323f16dd

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 0
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

# Suggests: covr, knitr, testthat
requirements:
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rstudioapi >=0.7
    - r-svgui >=1.0.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rstudioapi >=0.7
    - r-svgui >=1.0.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('svDialogs')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('svDialogs')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/SciViews/svDialogs, http://www.sciviews.org/SciViews-R
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Rapidly construct standard dialog boxes for your GUI, including  message boxes, input boxes, list, file or directory selection, ... In case R cannot display GUI dialog boxes, a simpler command line version of these interactive elements is also provided as fallback solution.
  license_family: GPL2

  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - dpryan79
    - johanneskoester
    - bgruening
